articles.title: Psychosis more common in recent generations in Ontario, study says
articles.description: The findings, Ottawa researcher Dr. Daniel Myran says, raise important questions about the possible causes and consequences of increasing numbers of psychotic disorder diagnoses.

articles.title: International law meant to limit effects of war at breaking point, study finds
articles.description: Report covering 23 conflicts over last 18 months concludes more than 100,000 civilians have been killed as war crimes rage out of controlAn authoritative survey of 23 armed conflicts over the last 18 months has concluded that international law seeking to limit the effects of war is at breaking point

articles.title: Justin Bieber returns to Grammys stage for stripped-down performance
articles.description: Justin Bieber returned to the Grammys stage Sunday for a stripped-down — in more ways than one — performance. Rocking nothing but a pair of boxers and socks, the Canadian pop star used a loop pedal to create a backing track with a guitar and drum machine before launching into his single “Yukon

articles.title: Copper Slump Deepens as Traders Wait for China Bulls to Step In
articles.description: Copper extended its slump from a record high, as traders debated whether bullish investors in China might start buying again after a tumultuous few days that have rocked global metals markets.

articles.title: Indonesian Stocks Resume Selloff on Weaker Commodity Prices
articles.description: Indonesian stocks resumed their selloff Monday, weighed by weaker commodity prices, complicating efforts by regulators to shore up confidence in Southeast Asia’s biggest equities market.
